title: Neonatal Resuscitation Simulation Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Knowledge and Understanding of Neonatal Physiological Structures
context.additional_context: Hybrid training environment combining real-time video conferencing tools with virtual simulation platforms

learning_goals: Learners can perform the five standard protocol steps (assessment, respiratory support, circulatory support, medication administration, post-management) in neonatal resuscitation simulation with 80% accuracy
Learners can complete initial response actions within 90 seconds through effective communication with team members during crisis situations in simulation training

Learners can write at least three analyses in their self-evaluation reports after training regarding their individual responsibility execution abilities and psychological traits (e.g., locus of control, emotional regulation)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
